hero.title: Japanese culture
hero.subtitle: AWAITS YOU
hero.description: Gengoffee offers French and Japanese language exchanges with participants from around the world in Paris and Tokyo.

carousel.title: Our events, your interaction
carousel.description: Each week talk during our events with foreign participants over a drink in Paris or Tokyo.

events.title: Events
events.description:
If you have basic knowledge in French or Japanese, join us for our events.
You'll be installed at a table of 6 to 8 people, you speak the language indicated for 15min, then you change language.

explanation.title: How does the event work?
explanation.1:
1. We'll find you a seat
at a table of 6 to 8 people.
explanation.2:
2. French, English or Japanese,
you'll speak in one language for
15 mins.
explanation.3:
3. After 15 mins, we switch language.
The conversation continues!
explanation.4:
4. Improve your language skills
with a range of conversation partners!

about.title: About Gengoffee
about.subtitle: Who are we?
about.description:
One step to learn a language is to practice. With Gengoffee, we wanted to create a place where people would be able to complete their learning through reel interactions and exchanges.

We are are a French-Japanese association that offers language exchange events where participants are able to meet other people from around the world exceptionally from France, Japan or English spoken countries.
about.followus: Follow us on our social media.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide a place where you can learn, practice and improve your language skills with other participants in a friendly environment.

1.title: Events
1.description: Multiple French-English or French-Japanese language exchanges with about 65 attendees each event and more than 7000 attendees in total.

2.title: Community
2.description: You can find our next langage exchange event date on our different social media (Meetup, Instagram and Facebook) who have more than 6000 followers.

3.title: Collaborators
3.description: Gengoffee is currently supported by collaboraters who actively make the association grows, on top of our different partners !
